entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 9:06 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 then northeast 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:06 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 10.
